籤詩版本二:
Kanye njengecrane ephuma kwindlwana yayo yokufa, kunokwenzeka ukubaleka kwindlwana yokufa.
Akukho zithintelo phakathi emantla, emazantsi nasempuma.Ungaya ngqo kwiJiuxiao Palace.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wecrane eshiya ikheji yayo.
Yonke into imbi kwangaphambili kwaye ilungile ekugqibeleni.
解曰: Akukho maxhala. Indlela inempumelelo. Hlala ngokukhululeka. Ukungakhathali njengomntu (uthixo).
籤詩故事一:
◇UZiya wasishiya isikhundla sakhe
Xa uJiang Ziya wayesebenza njengomxeli-thamsanqa, wabona ukuba ibhinqa elithile litshintshwe ngumoya we<em>jade pipa, ngoko wambamba wada wambetha ngelitye leinki. Inkulumbuso kaKumkani uZhou yachaza okwenzekileyo, yabuza ukuba kwenzeke ntoni, yaza yathatha uJiang Ziya ukuya kubona uKumkani uZhou. UJiang Ziya wasebenzisa iSamadhi yoMlilo oyinyaniso ukutshisa umoya wepipa ngaphandle kobume bayo bokuqala phambi koKumkani uZhou, kwaye uKumkani uZhou wamenza igosa eliphezulu.
Ukuze aphindezele umoya we-jade pipa, uDaji wabuza uKumkani uZhou ukuba ayalele uJiang Ziya ukuba akhe iqonga lamaxhama.UJiang Ziya wamkhalimela uKumkani uZhou, waza uKumkani uZhou wayalela ukuba abulawe.UJiang Ziya wasinda ngokusebenzisa amanzi. Emva kokubuyela ekhaya, uJiang Ziya wabuza uMa malunga nokuya eXiqi, kwaye uMa wayefuna ukumqhawula umtshato. Ngoko uJiang Ziya waya eXiqi (ikomkhulu likaKumkani uWen weZhou Dynasty) yedwa.
UJiang Ziya wafika eXiqi waza wahlala kwindawo yokuloba engasese ePanxi Gorge.
聖意: Andikhululekanga ekhaya kwaye ndifuna ukufuna intsebenziswano yezemali, ukuthengiselana, umtshato, iLiujia, abahambi ngeenyawo abangamadoda, ukubona amasimi, i-silkworms, inzuzo yasekwindla, ilahleko yemfuyo emithandathu, ukukhangela abantu, ukuthintela amatyala oluntu, ukufuduka, ukulahleka kwempahla, umzantsi-mpuma. izifo, ukubeka, ukuthumela iintaba namangcwaba, ukulunga.
